findings.rationale: An indefinite duration may impose perpetual obligations on the Receiving Party, potentially leading to future legal complications and unbounded liability.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: Vague terms like 'reasonable precautions' can lead to differing interpretations, increasing the risk of non-compliance.
findings.evidence_quote: to take all reasonable precautions to protect such Confidential Information.
